![](https://greencloudvps.com/logo.png)

**[GreenCloudVPS](https://greencloudvps.com/)** providing high class hosting solutions since 2013. We believe in defining superior service when it comes to virtual private servers and dedicated servers on a quality network and best support. You can contact us via both Live Chat, Skype or Tickets.

We have some special offers for you. We own all hardware, no renting, no overselling!

**Special KVM LA1**:

- Memory: 2GB / 2GB SWAP
- CPU: 1 core
- Hard Drive: 15GB Enterprise SSD
- Bandwidth: 1TB @ 1Gbps port
- IPv4: 1
- 3Gbps DDOS protection
- OS: Windows/Linux Available
- Control Panel: SolusVM
- Location: Los Angeles, CA - QuadraNET datacenter
- Looking glass: http://lgca.greencloudvps.com/

**Only $7/mo** with the coupon **LETSPECIAL**. **[Order here!](https://greencloudvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=190)**

**VN-512:**

- Memory: 512MB RAM
- CPU: 1 core
- Hard Drive: 10GB Enterprise SSD
- Bandwidth: 1TB @ 1Gbps port
- IPv4: 1
- OS: Windows/Linux Available
- Control Panel: SolusVM
- Location: Hanoi, Vietnam
- Looking glass: http://lgvn.greencloudvps.com/

**Only $7/mo. [Order here!](https://greencloudvps.com/1gbps-kvm-ssd-vietnam-vps.php)**
